title: Troubleshoot Bad Output from a Prompt
template: 1) A corrected prompt ready to paste so that I can retest in a separate chat window.
2) A 3-5 bullet rationale explaining the changes in plain language.
3) A quick self-check list verifying each success criterion.
4) Feedback on why the original prompt failed to meet expectations.

placeholders.name: role
placeholders.label: What role should this prompt take on?

placeholders.name: objective
placeholders.label: In a few sentences, what is the main objective that you're trying to achieve with this scenario?

placeholders.name: prompt_snippet
placeholders.label: What areas of the prompt are failing? (paste the specific section)

placeholders.name: expected_criteria
placeholders.label: Success criteria: What should the prompt achieve after fixing? (e.g., more concise, clearer, etc.)

placeholders.name: constraints
placeholders.label: What are the specific things you don't want the model to do? (optional)

placeholders.name: context
placeholders.label: Was there any missing context that could help? (optional)
